title: Rethink Mental Illness
content:
Support and advice for people living with mental illness.
Phone: 0300 5000 927 (Mon-Fri, 10am-2pm)
Website: [www.rethink.org](http://www.rethink.org)

title: Depression Alliance
content:
Charity for sufferers of depression. Has a network of self-help groups.
Website: [www.depressionalliance.org](http://www.depressionalliance.org/)

title: CALM
content:
CALM is the Campaign Against Living Miserably, for men aged 15-35.
Website: [www.thecalmzone.net](http://www.thecalmzone.net/)

title: Bipolar UK
content:
A charity helping people living with manic depression or bipolar disorder.
Website: [www.bipolaruk.org.uk](http://www.bipolaruk.org.uk)

title: Samaritans
content:
Confidential support for people experiencing feelings of distress or despair.
Phone: 08457 90 90 90 (24-hour helpline)
Website: [www.samaritans.org.uk](http://www.samaritans.org.uk/)

title: Sane
content:
Charity offering support and carrying out research into mental illness. 
Phone: 0845 767 8000 (daily, 6pm-11pm)
SANEmail email: [sanemail@org.uk](mailto:sanemail@org.uk)
Website: [www.sane.org.uk](http://www.sane.org.uk/)

title: Mind
content:
Promotes the views and needs of people with mental health problems.
Phone: 0300 123 3393 (Mon-Fri, 9am-6pm)
Website: [www.mind.org.uk](http://www.mind.org.uk/)

title: The Mental Health Foundation
content:
Provides information and support for anyone with mental health problems or learning disabilities.
Website: [www.mentalhealth.org.uk](http://www.mentalhealth.org.uk/)

title: YoungMinds
content:
Information on child and adolescent mental health. Services for parents and professionals.
Phone: Parents' helpline 0808 802 5544 (Mon-Fri, 9.30am-4pm)
Website: [www.youngminds.org.uk](http://www.youngminds.org.uk/)

title: PAPYRUS
content:
Young suicide prevention society.
Phone: HOPElineUK 0800 068 4141 (Mon-Fri,10am-5pm & 7pm-10pm. Weekends 2pm-5pm)
Website: [www.papyrus-uk.org](http://www.papyrus-uk.org)

title: NSPCC
content:
Children's charity dedicated to ending child abuse and child cruelty. 
Phone: 0800 1111 for Childline for children (24-hour helpline)
0808 800 5000 for adults concerned about a child (24-hour helpline)
Website: [www.nspcc.org.uk](http://www.nspcc.org.uk/)

title: Refuge
content:
Advice on dealing with domestic violence.
Phone: 0808 2000 247 (24-hour helpline)
Website: [www.refuge.org.uk](http://www.refuge.org.uk/)

title: Alcoholics Anonymous
content:
Phone: 0845 769 7555 (24-hour helpline)
Website: [www.alcoholics-anonymous.org.uk](http://www.alcoholics-anonymous.org.uk/)

title: Narcotics Anonymous
content:
Phone: 0300 999 1212 (daily until midnight)
Website: [www.ukna.org](http://www.ukna.org/)

title: Gamblers Anonymous
content: Website: [www.gamblersanonymous.org.uk](http://www.gamblersanonymous.org.uk/)

title: Alzheimer's Society
content:
Provides information on dementia, including factsheets and helplines.
Phone: 0300 222 1122 (Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm. Weekends, 10am-4pm)
Website: [www.alzheimers.org.uk](http://www.alzheimers.org.uk/)

title: Cruse Bereavement Care
content:
Phone: 0844 477 9400 (Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm)
Website: [www.crusebereavementcare.org.uk](http://www.crusebereavementcare.org.uk/)

title: Rape Crisis
content:
Phone: 0808 802 9999 (daily, 12pm-2.30pm, 7pm-9.30pm)
Website: [www.rapecrisis.org.uk](http://www.rapecrisis.org.uk/)

title: Victim Support
content:
Phone: 0845 30 30 900 (Mon-Fri, 9am-8pm. Weekends, 9am-7pm)
Website: [www.victimsupport.org](http://www.victimsupport.org/)

title: Beat
content:
Phone: 0845 634 1414 (Mon-Thurs, 1.30pm-4.30pm)
Website: [www.b-eat.co.uk](http://www.b-eat.co.uk/)

title: Mencap
content:
Charity working with people with a learning disability, their families and carers.
Phone: 0808 808 1111 (for information on their services)
Website: [www.mencap.org.uk](http://www.mencap.org.uk/)

title: OCD (Obsessive Compulsive Disorder) Action
content:
Support for people with obsessive compulsive disorder. Includes information on treatment and online resources.
Phone: 0845 390 6232 (Mon-Fri, 9.30am-5pm)
Website: [www.ocdaction.org.uk](http://www.ocdaction.org.uk/)

title: OCD UK
No Panic
content:
Voluntary charity offering support for sufferers of panic attacks and OCD. Offers a course to help overcome your phobia/OCD. Includes a helpline.
Phone: 0800 138 8889 (daily, 10am-10pm)

title: Family Lives
content:
Phone: 0808 800 2222 (daily, 7am-midnight)
Website: [www.familylives.org.uk](http://familylives.org.uk/)

title: Anxiety UK
content:
Charity providing support if you've been diagnosed with an anxiety condition.
Phone: 08444 775 774 (Mon-Fri, 9.30am-5.30pm)
Website: [www.anxietyuk.org.uk](http://www.anxietyuk.org.uk/)

title: Relate
content:
Phone: 0300 100 1234 (for information on their services)
Website: [www.relate.org.uk](http://www.relate.org.uk)
